'''Romaritime Meluserenity''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Wondrous Dragonheir" [[Sigewinne]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|Romaritime Meluserenity}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Silvershower Heartstrings]], a weapon tailored to Sigewinne's gameplay mechanics.
